name: Flipster Lite
description:
Flipster is an exciting and addictive new puzzle game. It’s a cross between a JigSaw puzzle and a Rubiks Cube. Use your finger to flip 3D cubes in space to recreate a picture. Use the pictures included in the game. Take it easy on a simple 6 cube puzzle or go for a real challenge with 54 cubes.
“Easy to learn, difficult to master” Flipster will keep you engaged and entertained.
Hours of entertainment and no puzzle is ever the same with Flipster’s built in randomness.

Features:
-4 difficulty settings: Easy (2x3), Normal (3x4), Hard (5x7), and Impossible (6x9)
-Flipster saves your place if you have to close it
-smooth 3D animation and responsive controls
-sound effects with the option to turn off
-game play instructions and tips to help get you started

Have a few minutes to spare? Try it today and you’ll Flip for Flipster!
